html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02782025-03-05FIN
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Prescribed Arrangement - Air Canada)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (PRESCRIBED ARRANGEMENT - AIR CANADA) in order to (1) continue to exempt a special-purpose trust established in 2009 by Air Canada from being an retirement compensation arrangement (RCA ) under the act; and (2) ensure that the purposes of the definition of an RCA reflects the updated 2022 Letter of Intent (LOI) entered by Air Canada and the unions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0075 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (PRESCRIBED ARRANGEMENT - AIR CANADA) in order to (1) continue to exempt a special-purpose trust established in 2009 by Air Canada from being an retirement compensation arrangement (RCA ) under the act; and (2) ensure that the purposes of the definition of an RCA reflects the updated 2022 Letter of Intent (LOI) entered by Air Canada and the unions.
